captions.text:
- I'M GOOD.
HOW ARE YOU DOING?

IT'S BEEN ABOUT FOUR YEARS
SINCE YOU'VE BEEN HERE,
AND WHAT YOU BEEN UP TO?

LIFTED MYSELF OFF
THE CASINO FLOOR IN CANADA.

THEY'RE PROUD OF YOU.
- THANK YOU VERY MUCH.

I'M A BIGGER JUSTIN BIEBER FAN
THAN I THOUGHT I WAS.

- BUT, UH, YOU KNOW
HOW THEY ALWAYS SAY,

"WHATEVER HAPPENS IN VEGAS,
STAYS IN VEGAS"?

BUT WHATEVER HAPPENS IN CANADA,
EVERYBODY KNOWS.
I DON'T KNOW THE WHOLE THING.

- AND THE AUTHORITIES
ARE MUCH POLITER...

- AND THEY TOLD ME--
THEY SAID,

"AND IF IT DOES CONTINUE,
WE WOULD BE HONORED

IF YOU WOULD BE MAYOR
OF TORONTO."

SO THAT'S NICE
THAT THEY WERE POLITE,

SO YOU WERE ASLEEP
ON THE FLOOR IN THE CASINO?

I WAS ON MY WAY
TO MY ROOM.

I JUST MISSED IT
BY 35 FLOORS.

I'M LIKE, "HOW THE HELL
CAN I SLEEP ON THAT CARPET?"

- YEAH,
THERE'S A LOT GOING ON.

- IT WAS SO LOUD.
OH, YEAH.

YOU KNOW, AND GUYS WERE BETTING
ON WHETHER I'D GET UP.

YOU KNOW, SO IT WAS ON THE BOARD
AND STUFF, YOU KNOW?

AND THEN ONE PERSON CAME BY
AND SAID,

"I DIDN'T KNOW THE DOG WHISPERER
DRANK THAT MUCH."
- SO YOU GOT CESAR IN TROUBLE.

- I DID.
I DID FOR A SECOND.

SINCE THEN, I HAVE NOT HAD
A DROP OF ALCOHOL.

- GOOD FOR YOU.
GOOD FOR YOU.

THAT WAS A NICE GOING-AWAY PARTY
FOR THAT GUY,

AND THEN
I'M THE NEW GEORGE NOW...

- GOOD.
- SITTING IN FRONT OF YOU.

- THANK YOU VERY MUCH.
- I WANT YOU TO BE...

DOESN'T MEAN
WE CAN HANDLE IT.

- YOU KNOW, SOMETIMES YOU SEE,
LIKE, A FAT CHEF.

- THEY EAT THEIR OWN FOOD,
BUT WE'RE NOT...

- YOU'RE NOT SUPPOSED
TO DRINK THE TEQUILA.

- THAT'S A LOT OF--
I'M UNDER A LOT OF PRESSURE.

THE WAFFLE TACO,
CHIPOTLE A SUCCESS--

THERE'S A LOT--
THERE'S A LOT GOING ON.

- WELL, I'M GLAD
THAT YOU'RE OKAY.

AND I'M GLAD THAT YOU'RE...
- THANK YOU.

- STOPPING THAT
OR TAKING A BREAK

comments.author: Adrienne Kelly (ShareMyAdventure)

comments.text:
well this convo got heated fast.
IN MY OPINION..
Its fine to post pictures with a drink in your hand, especially if its a 
nice one like wine or a pina colada. but if youre underage and only 
drinking to get drunk then its trashy. I must admit, Ive got pictures of me 
with drinks in my hand, but only because I hangout at happy hour for a 
drink or two, only to hangout with my friends. No shame in that.

also, despite Canada or the U.S. passing out on a casino floor while being 
intoxicated will 10/10 get you thrown in the drunk tank.
comments.author: Adrienne Kelly (ShareMyAdventure)

comments.text:
+rko32491 well I think you imply that when you say that a) it's tacky to 
have pictures taken while having a drink in your hand, b) you could always 
put your drink down before getting a pic taken.. I don't always think about 
putting it down,because in that moment I'm not thinking "oh,I should hide 
it",cause it's normal to me and not immoral.. but again,maybe here in Italy 
there's a different culture about that.
comments.author: gioiaribelle

comments.text: Didnt say you should be ashamed either
comments.author: rko32491

comments.text:
+rko32491 well but I don't understand why should I be ashamed of 
drinking..but maybe we have two different cultures,I don't know..
comments.author: gioiaribelle

comments.text:
You know what I take that back. Its trashy to be passed out, its tacky 
taking pictures and POSTING them. You could always put your cup down taking 
pic
comments.author: rko32491

comments.text:
+rko32491 Because it happens really often that when you're celebrating 
something,like somebody's degree,or even when you're just hanging out with 
your friends, somebody takes pictures and you have a glass of beer or wine 
or a cocktail in your hands. To me that's very very very normal,that's why 
I'm speechless. It doesn't mean I'm trashy or an alcoholic,to me.
comments.author: gioiaribelle

comments.text:
I didn't say you couldn't take a pic with alcohol in your hand. Why are you 
speechless one and two I'm interested in why you would take a pic with 
alcohol in your hand. I never understood that
comments.author: rko32491

comments.text:
